_header: In our Gospel is goodly graid
_description: Gospel for Ash Wednesday, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: In oure godspel es gudely graydHow crist to his desciples sayd…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þat es to vnderstand and weLif noght in luf and charite
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Cum ieiunatis nolite fieri & cetera.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia iiii in capite ieiunii Secundum Matheum (rubric, f. 41vb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.30-32.
